Name: Neon Boost
About the game: Neon Boost is a frenetic First Person Platformer based on mechanics like Rocket-Jump or Wall-Run. Run across 3 different worlds to get the best times! Run, Wall-Run, Slide, and most importantly, use your weapon to Rocket - Jump and get over the obstacles! Features 72 levels (36 standard levels + 36 'Lights Off' variants) Alternative Game Mode: Lights Off An original Synthwave-inspired soundtrack Achievements! Play on 3 different worlds: Laser City Tesla World Cosmic Highway Game Mode: Lights Off Each level has an alternative version where you have to reach the goal with limited visibility.
